name: Robot Boy
description:
Robot Boy is a platform game, the goal is to climb up the house of RX-4. Obviously, the road is long and winding, it can be so close to his house and fell so low. This game will put your patience and control of your emotions to any test. Try to wait for the summit to retrieve information on upcoming events.

The game is characterized by:
- exciting gameplay
- An endearing robot
- Single level game (estimated length: 4 hours)
- Many falls
- Work of patience and mastery of your emotions
